duties_responsibilities.duty: Advise single-family, multi-family, and virtual-family office clients on a full spectrum of tax services including structuring, modeling, succession planning, and tax compliance.
Manage and oversee the engagement team focused on entity, individual, fiduciary, and gift/estate taxation, planning, and execution of client tax engagements.
Collaborate with specialists regarding estate and gift planning, taxation, state and local taxation, and international taxation.
Provide leadership, training, and career mentorship to staff and supervisor level team members.
Drive and collaborate with senior leadership on growth opportunities with existing clients and prospects.
Develop and sustain strong relationships with clients and other professional advisors through a commitment to outstanding client service.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in accounting or business-related field, J.D., LL.M. in taxation and/or Masters in Taxation
